title: Why do we still not have this setting?
body:
There have been complaints and riot responses for 8 years plus now about the issue of cursor size and every time we actually do get a response its always a "well we are working on this which has higher priority" so why has this issue to many people still not been touched? 

posts and responses from 2010 and 2012 that show how long this problem has been occurring 

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=151641&page=1#post1850338

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2632641&page=1#post29820211

replies.body: last thing i read riot is actually working on a new cursor with said setting/s in mind
At least we got 4K support.. right?
where do i find this 4k support?
we need to evolve, and that usually takes a few million years. Checking occasionally will help i guess.
